widget.name: jqxComboBox
widget.description: Enables the user to easily pick an item from a list of selectable items displayed in a drop-down.

properties.name: animationType
properties.description:
Sets the type of the animation.

Possible Values: 
'fade'
'slide'
'none'

properties.name: autoComplete
properties.description: Sets or gets the whether the 'autoComplete' feature is enabled or disabled. When this feature is enabled, the jqxComboBox displays in the popup listbox, only the items that match the searched text.

properties.name: autoOpen
properties.description: Sets or gets whether the DropDown is automatically opened when the mouse cursor is moved over the widget.

properties.name: autoItemsHeight
properties.description: Sets or gets whether items will wrap when they reach the width of the dropDown.

properties.name: autoDropDownHeight
properties.description: Sets or gets whether the height of the jqxComboBox's ListBox displayed in the widget's DropDown is calculated as a sum of the items heights.

properties.name: closeDelay
properties.description: Sets the delay of the 'close' animation.

properties.name: checkboxes
properties.description: Determines whether checkboxes will be displayed next to the list items.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Enables/disables the jqxComboBox.

properties.name: displayMember
properties.description: Sets or gets the displayMember of the Items. The displayMember specifies the name of an object property to display. The name is contained in the collection specified by the 'source' property.

properties.name: dropDownHorizontalAlignment
properties.description:
Sets or gets the DropDown's alignment.

Possible Values: 
'left'
'right'

properties.name: dropDownVerticalAlignment
properties.description:
Sets or gets the DropDown's alignment.

Possible Values: 
'top'
'bottom'

properties.name: dropDownHeight
properties.description: Sets or gets the height of the jqxComboBox's ListBox displayed in the widget's DropDown.

properties.name: dropDownWidth
properties.description: Sets or gets the width of the jqxComboBox's ListBox displayed in the widget's DropDown.

properties.name: enableHover
properties.description: Enables/disables the hover state.

properties.name: enableSelection
properties.description: Enables/disables the selection.

properties.name: enableBrowserBoundsDetection
properties.description: Sets or gets whether the dropdown detects the browser window's bounds and automatically adjusts the dropdown's position.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Sets or gets the jqxComboBox height.

properties.name: itemHeight
properties.description: Sets or gets the height of the jqxComboBox Items. When the itemHeight == - 1, each item's height is equal to its desired height.

properties.name: multiSelect
properties.description: Determines whether the jqxComboBox is in multi-select mode.

properties.name: minLength
properties.description: Determines the minimum number of characters that need to be entered by the user for search in remote data source when remoteAutoComplete property is set to true.

properties.name: openDelay
properties.description: Sets or gets the delay of the 'open' animation.

properties.name: popupZIndex
properties.description: Sets or gets the popup's z-index.

properties.name: placeHolder
properties.description: Sets or gets the input field's place holder.

properties.name: remoteAutoComplete
properties.description: Determines whether the items displayed in the popup come from a remote data source. When this property is set to true, the jqxComboBox calls the 'search' callback function when the user types into the input field.

properties.name: remoteAutoCompleteDelay
properties.description: Determines the delay between two keystrokes. The search callback function is called on timeout. The value is specified in milliseconds.

properties.name: renderer
properties.description: Callback function which is called when an item is rendered. By using the renderer function, you can customize the look of the list items.
properties.example:
$('#jqxComboBox').jqxComboBox({renderer: function (index, label, value) {
    var datarecord = data[index];
    return datarecord.firstname + " " + datarecord.lastname;
    }
    });
properties.exampleDescription: renderer is set to a custom rendering function
properties.ts_dataType: (index?: ComboBoxRenderer['index'], label?: ComboBoxRenderer['label'], value?: ComboBoxRenderer['value']) => string

properties.name: renderSelectedItem
properties.description: Callback function which is called when the selected item is rendered. By using the renderSelectedItem function, you can customize the displayed text in the ComboBox's input field.
properties.example:
renderSelectedItem: function(index, item)
{
    var item = dataAdapter.records[index];
    if (item != null) {
        var label = item.name + ", " + item.countryName + ", " + item.adminName1;
        return label;
    }
    return "";   
}
properties.exampleDescription: renderSelectedItem is set to a custom rendering function

exampleInit.exampleData:
const label = item.value + ' - Visible: ' + item.visible;
        return label;

properties.name: rtl
properties.description: Sets or gets a value indicating whether widget's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.

properties.name: selectedIndex
properties.description: Sets or gets the selected index.

properties.name: showArrow
properties.description: Determines whether the jqxComboBox shows its dropdown button.

properties.name: showCloseButtons
properties.description: Determines whether the jqxComboBox shows the items close buttons in multi-select mode.

properties.name: searchMode
properties.description:
Sets or gets the item search mode. When the user types into the edit field, the jqxComboBox widget tries to find the searched item using the entered text and the selected search mode.

Possible Values: 
'none'
'contains'
'containsignorecase'
'equals'
'equalsignorecase'
'startswithignorecase'
'startswith'
'endswithignorecase'
'endswith'

properties.name: search
properties.description: Callback function which is called when the 'remoteAutoComplate' property is set to true and the user types into the ComboBox's input field.
properties.example:
$("#jqxComboBox").jqxComboBox(
{
    width: 250,
    height: 25,
    source: dataAdapter,
    remoteAutoComplete: true,
    selectedIndex: 0,
    displayMember: "name",
    valueMember: "countryName",
    renderer: function (index, label, value) {
        var item = dataAdapter.records[index];
        if (item != null) {
            var label = item.name + ", " + item.countryName + ", " + item.adminName1;
            return label;
        }
        return "";
    },
    renderSelectedItem: function(index, item)
    {
        var item = dataAdapter.records[index];
        if (item != null) {
            var label = item.name + ", " + item.countryName + ", " + item.adminName1;
            return label;
        }
        return "";   
    },
    search: function (searchString) {
        dataAdapter.dataBind();
    }
});
properties.exampleDescription: search property is set to a custom function

properties.name: source
properties.description: Sets or gets the items source.

properties.name: scrollBarSize
properties.description: Sets or gets the scrollbars size.

properties.name: template
properties.description:
Determines the button's template as an alternative of the default styles.

Possible Values: 
'default' - the default template. The style depends only on the "theme" property value.
'primary' - dark blue style for extra visual weight.
'success' - green style for successful or positive action.
'warning' - orange style which indicates caution.
'danger' - red style which indicates a dangerous or negative action.
'info' - blue button, not tied to a semantic action or use.

Code examples

Set the template property. 

$("#jqxComboBox").jqxComboBox({ template: 'primary'});

Get the template property. 

var template = $('#jqxComboBox').jqxComboBox('template');

properties.name: theme
properties.description:
Sets the widget's theme.

  • Include the theme's CSS file after jqx.base.css.
    The following code example adds the 'material' theme. 
    

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../jqwidgets/styles/jqx.base.css" type="text/css" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="../../jqwidgets/styles/jqx.material.css" type="text/css" />
  • Set the widget's theme property to 'material' when you initialize it.

properties.name: validateSelection
properties.description: Determines whether an item can be selected in multi-select mode.
properties.example:
$("#jqxComboBox").jqxComboBox({validateSelection: function(itemValue)
                            {
                                if (itemValue == "Breve")
                                {
                                   return false;
                                }
                                return true;
                            }                             
                         });
properties.exampleDescription: validateSelection is set to a custom function

properties.name: valueMember
properties.description: Sets or gets the valueMember of the Items. The valueMember specifies the name of an object property to set as a 'value' of the list items. The name is contained in the collection specified by the 'source' property.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Sets or gets the jqxComboBox's width.

events.name: bindingComplete
events.description: This event is triggered when the data binding operation is completed.
events.exampleDescription: Bind to the bindingComplete event by type:jqxComboBox

events.name: checkChange
events.description: This event is triggered when an item is checked/unchecked.
events.exampleDescription: Bind to the checkChange event by type:jqxComboBox
events.example:
$("#jqxComboBox").on('checkChange', function (event)
{
    if (event.args) {
    var item = event.args.item;
    var value = item.value;
    var label = item.label;
    var checked = item.checked;
    var checkedItems = $("#jqxComboBox").jqxComboBox('getCheckedItems');
}
});

events.name: close
events.description: This event is triggered when the popup ListBox is closed.
events.exampleDescription: Bind to the close event by type:jqxComboBox

events.name: change
events.description: This event is triggered when the user selects an item.
events.exampleDescription: Bind to the change event by type:jqxComboBox
events.example:
$('#jqxComboBox').on('change', function (event) 
{
    var args = event.args;
    if (args) {
    // index represents the item's index.                          
    var index = args.index;
    var item = args.item;
    // get item's label and value.
    var label = item.label;
    var value = item.value;
    var type = args.type; // keyboard, mouse or null depending on how the item was selected.
}
});

events.name: open
events.description: This event is triggered when the popup ListBox is opened.
events.exampleDescription: Bind to the open event by type:jqxComboBox

events.name: select
events.description: This event is triggered when the user selects an item.
events.exampleDescription: Bind to the select event by type:jqxComboBox
events.example:
$('#jqxComboBox').on('select', function (event) 
{
    var args = event.args;
    if (args) {
    // index represents the item's index.                       
    var index = args.index;
    var item = args.item;
    // get item's label and value.
    var label = item.label;
    var value = item.value;
    var type = args.type; // keyboard, mouse or null depending on how the item was selected.
}
});

events.name: unselect
events.description: This event is triggered when the user unselects an item.
events.exampleDescription: Bind to the unselect event by type:jqxComboBox
events.example:
$('#jqxComboBox').on('unselect', function (event) 
{
    var args = event.args;
    if (args) {
    // index represents the item's index.                                  
    var index = args.index;
    var item = args.item;
    // get item's label and value.
    var label = item.label;
    var value = item.value;
}
});

methods.name: addItem
methods.description:
Adds a new item to the jqxComboBox. Returns 'true', if the new item is added or 'false' if the item is not added.

  • label - determines the item's label.
  • value - determines the item's value.
  • disabled - determines whether the item is enabled/disabled.
  • checked - determines whether item is checked/unchecked.
  • hasThreeStates - determines whether the item's checkbox supports three states.
  • html - determines the item's display html. This can be used instead of label.
  • group - determines the item's group.
methods.exampleDescription: adds an item in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: clearSelection
methods.description: Clears all selected items.
methods.exampleDescription: clears the selection in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all items.
methods.exampleDescription: clears all items in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: close
methods.description: Hides the popup listbox.
methods.exampleDescription: closes jqxComboBox

methods.name: checkIndex
methods.description: Checks a list item when the 'checkboxes' property value is true. The index is zero-based, i.e to check the first item, the 'checkIndex' method should be called with parameter 0.
methods.exampleDescription: checks a box in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: checkItem
methods.description: Checks an item.
methods.exampleDescription: checks an item in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: checkAll
methods.description: Checks all list items when the 'checkboxes' property value is true.
methods.exampleDescription: checks all of the items in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: destroy
methods.description:
Destroys the widget.

Code examples

Invoke the destroy method. 

$('#jqxComboBox').jqxComboBox('destroy');
methods.exampleDescription: destroys the jqxComboBox

methods.name: disableItem
methods.description:
Disables an item. Item is an object.

  • label - determines the item's label.
  • value - determines the item's value.
  • disabled - determines whether the item is enabled/disabled.
  • checked - determines whether item is checked/unchecked.
  • hasThreeStates - determines whether the item's checkbox supports three states.
  • html - determines the item's display html. This can be used instead of label.
  • group - determines the item's group.
methods.exampleDescription: disables an items in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: disableAt
methods.description: Disables an item by index. Index is a number.
methods.exampleDescription: disables an items in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: enableItem
methods.description:
Enables an item. Item is an object.

  • label - determines the item's label.
  • value - determines the item's value.
  • disabled - determines whether the item is enabled/disabled.
  • checked - determines whether item is checked/unchecked.
  • hasThreeStates - determines whether the item's checkbox supports three states.
  • html - determines the item's display html. This can be used instead of label.
  • group - determines the item's group.
methods.exampleDescription: enables an items in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: enableAt
methods.description: Enables a disabled item by index. Index is a number.
methods.exampleDescription: enables an items in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: ensureVisible
methods.description: Ensures that an item is visible. index is number. When necessary, the jqxComboBox scrolls to the item to make it visible.
methods.exampleDescription: ensures the visibility of an items in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Sets the focus to the widget.
methods.exampleDescription: focuses the jqxComboBox

methods.name: getItem
methods.description:
Gets item by index. The returned value is an object with the following fields:

  • label - gets item's label.
  • value - gets the item's value.
  • disabled - gets whether the item is enabled/disabled.
  • checked - gets whether the item is checked/unchecked.
  • hasThreeStates - determines whether the item's checkbox supports three states.
  • html - gets the item's display html. This can be used instead of label.
  • index - gets the item's index.
  • group - gets the item's group.
methods.exampleDescription: gets the an items by its index in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: getItemByValue
methods.description:
Gets an item by its value. The returned value is an object with the following fields:

  • label - gets item's label.
  • value - gets the item's value.
  • disabled - gets whether the item is enabled/disabled.
  • checked - gets whether the item is checked/unchecked.
  • hasThreeStates - determines whether the item's checkbox supports three states.
  • html - gets the item's display html. This can be used instead of label.
  • index - gets the item's index.
  • group - gets the item's group.
methods.exampleDescription: gets the an items by its value in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: getVisibleItems
methods.description:
Gets all items displayed in the ComboBox. The method could be useful for getting the currently visible items after auto complete. The returned value is an array of Items.

  • label - gets item's label.
  • value - gets the item's value.
  • disabled - gets whether the item is enabled/disabled.
  • checked - gets whether the item is checked/unchecked.
  • hasThreeStates - determines whether the item's checkbox supports three states.
  • html - gets the item's display html. This can be used instead of label.
  • index - gets the item's index.
  • group - gets the item's group.
methods.exampleDescription: returns an Array of the visible items and displays the first 2 of them

methods.name: getItems
methods.description:
Gets all items. The returned value is an array of Items.

  • label - gets item's label.
  • value - gets the item's value.
  • disabled - gets whether the item is enabled/disabled.
  • checked - gets whether the item is checked/unchecked.
  • hasThreeStates - determines whether the item's checkbox supports three states.
  • html - gets the item's display html. This can be used instead of label.
  • index - gets the item's index.
  • group - gets the item's group.
methods.exampleDescription: returns an Array of all items and displays the first 2 of them

methods.name: getCheckedItems
methods.description:
Gets the checked items. The returned value is an array of Items.

  • label - gets item's label.
  • value - gets the item's value.
  • disabled - gets whether the item is enabled/disabled.
  • checked - gets whether the item is checked/unchecked.
  • hasThreeStates - determines whether the item's checkbox supports three states.
  • html - gets the item's display html. This can be used instead of label.
  • index - gets the item's index.
  • group - gets the item's group.
methods.exampleDescription: returns an Array of all checked items and displays them

methods.name: getSelectedItem
methods.description:
Gets the selected item. The returned value is an object or null(if there is no selected item).

  • label - gets item's label.
  • value - gets the item's value.
  • disabled - gets whether the item is enabled/disabled.
  • checked - gets whether the item is checked/unchecked.
  • hasThreeStates - determines whether the item's checkbox supports three states.
  • html - gets the item's display html. This can be used instead of label.
  • index - gets the item's index.
  • group - gets the item's group.
methods.exampleDescription: returns the selected item and displays it

methods.name: getSelectedItems
methods.description:
Gets the selected items when "multiselect" is turned on. The returned value is an Array with objects.

  • label - gets item's label.
  • value - gets the item's value.
  • disabled - gets whether the item is enabled/disabled.
  • checked - gets whether the item is checked/unchecked.
  • hasThreeStates - determines whether the item's checkbox supports three states.
  • html - gets the item's display html. This can be used instead of label.
  • index - gets the item's index.
  • group - gets the item's group.
methods.exampleDescription: returns the selected items

methods.name: getSelectedIndex
methods.description: Gets the index of the selected item. The returned value is the index of the selected item. If there's no selected item, -1 is returned.
methods.exampleDescription: returns the selected item's index and displays it

methods.name: insertAt
methods.description:
Inserts a new item to the jqxComboBox. Returns 'true', if the new item is inserted or false if the insertaion fails. The first parameter is object or string - the new item. The second parameter is number - the item's index.

  • label - determines the item's label.
  • value - determines the item's value.
  • disabled - determines whether the item is enabled/disabled.
  • checked - determines whether item is checked/unchecked.
  • hasThreeStates - determines whether the item's checkbox supports three states.
  • html - determines the item's display html. This can be used instead of label.
  • group - determines the item's group.
methods.exampleDescription: inserts an item in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: isOpened
methods.description: Returns true, if the popup is opened. Otherwise returns false.
methods.exampleDescription: check whether the jqxComboBox is opened

methods.name: indeterminateIndex
methods.description: Indeterminates a list item when the 'checkboxes' property value is true. The index is zero-based, i.e to indeterminate the first item, the 'indeterminateIndex' method should be called with parameter 0.
methods.exampleDescription: indeterminates a box in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: indeterminateItem
methods.description: Indeterminates an item.
methods.exampleDescription: indeterminate an item in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: loadFromSelect
methods.description: Loads list items from a 'select' tag.
methods.exampleDescription: loads list items from a 'select' tag.

customExample.customCode:
<template>
  <div>
    <JqxComboBox ref="myComboBox"
      :width="200" :height="25"
    />
    <br/>
    <select style='height: 25px; width: 200px;' id='select'>
        <option>Affogato</option>
        <option>Americano</option>
        <option>Bicerin</option>
        <option>Breve</option>
        <option>Caf Bombn</option>
        <option>Caff Corretto</option>
        <option>Caf Crema</option>
        <option>Caff Latte</option>
        <option>Caff macchiato</option>
        <option>Caf mlange</option>
        <option>Coffee milk</option>
        <option>Cafe mocha</option>
        <option>Cappuccino</option>
        <option>Carajillo</option>
        <option>Cuban espresso</option>
        <option>Espresso</option>
        <option>The Flat White</option>
        <option>Frappuccino</option>
        <option>Galao</option>
        <option>Greek frappe coffee</option>
        <option>Iced Coffee</option>
        <option>Indian filter coffee</option>
        <option>Instant coffee</option>
        <option>Irish coffee</option>
        <option>Liqueur coffee</option>
    </select>
  </div>
</template>
 
<script>
  import JqxComboBox from 'jqwidgets-scripts/jqwidgets-vue/vue_jqxcombobox.vue';
 
  export default {
    components: {
      JqxComboBox
    },
    data: function () {
      return  {
        source: [
          'Affogato',
          'Americano',
          'Bicerin',
          'Breve',
          'Cappuccino',
          'Espresso',
          'Frappuccino',
          'Iced Coffee',
          'Irish coffee',
          'Liqueur coffee'
        ]
      }
    },
    mounted: function () {
      this.$refs.myComboBox.loadFromSelect('select');
    }
  }
</script>

methods.name: open
methods.description: Shows the popup listbox.
methods.exampleDescription: opens jqxComboBox

methods.name: removeItem
methods.description: Removes an item from the listbox. Parameter type: object returned by the "getItem" method or string - the value of an item. Returns 'true', if the item is removed or 'false', if the item is not removed.
methods.exampleDescription: removes an item in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: removeAt
methods.description: Removes an item from the listbox. Parameter type: number - the index of the item. The method returns 'true', if the item is removed or 'false', if the item is not removed.
methods.exampleDescription: removes an item in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: selectIndex
methods.description: Selects an item by index. The index is zero-based, i.e to select the first item, the 'selectIndex' method should be called with parameter 0.
methods.exampleDescription: select an item by its index in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: selectItem
methods.description: Selects an item.
methods.exampleDescription: select an item in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: updateItem
methods.description:
Updates an item. The first parameter is the new item. The second parameter could be an existing item or the value of an existing item.

  • label - determines the item's label.
  • value - determines the item's value.
  • disabled - determines whether the item is enabled/disabled.
  • checked - determines whether item is checked/unchecked.
  • hasThreeStates - determines whether the item's checkbox supports three states.
  • html - determines the item's display html. This can be used instead of label.
  • group - determines the item's group.
methods.exampleDescription: updates an item in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: updateAt
methods.description:
Updates an item. The first parameter is the new item. The second parameter is the index of the item to be updated.

  • label - determines the item's label.
  • value - determines the item's value.
  • disabled - determines whether the item is enabled/disabled.
  • checked - determines whether item is checked/unchecked.
  • hasThreeStates - determines whether the item's checkbox supports three states.
  • html - determines the item's display html. This can be used instead of label.
  • group - determines the item's group.
methods.exampleDescription: updates an item in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: unselectIndex
methods.description: Unselects item by index. The index is zero-based, i.e to unselect the first item, the 'unselectIndex' method should be called with parameter 0.
methods.exampleDescription: unselect an item by its index in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: unselectItem
methods.description: Unselects an item.
methods.exampleDescription: unselect an item in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: uncheckIndex
methods.description: Unchecks a list item when the 'checkboxes' property value is true. The index is zero-based, i.e to uncheck the first item, the 'uncheckIndex' method should be called with parameter 0.
methods.exampleDescription: unchecks a box in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: uncheckItem
methods.description: Unchecks an item.
methods.exampleDescription: unchecks an item in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: uncheckAll
methods.description: Unchecks all list items when the 'checkboxes' property value is true.
methods.exampleDescription: unchecks all of the items in the jqxComboBox

methods.name: val
methods.description: Sets or gets the selected value.
methods.exampleDescription: sets or gets the selected value in the jqxComboBox
